title: Canada's Pacific Province and northland
brief_description: Highlights the Pacific Province and northern lands of Canada - British Columbia, the Yukon Territory and the North-west Territories, their historical development and the backgrounds of their people. The land, climate, natural resources and the importance of farming, fishing and lumbering are shown.
